comments: Stewart (DET) establishes himself in Hardaway Jr.'s (DAL) path and does not deliver illegal contact as the defensive switch simultaneously occurs.
Hardaway Jr. (DAL) engages and disengages with Stewart (DET) as Stewart rolls into the lane following the expiration of the pick.

Ivey (DET) makes clean contact with the ball and causes it to become loose prior to incidental body contact occurring with Finney-Smith (DAL). Ivey then makes further clean forearm contact with the ball after he and Finney-Smith come together.
Hayes (DET) brings his right hand toward Dinwiddie's (DAL) path and marginal contact occurs with Dinwiddie's front as he starts his drive.
Dinwiddie (DAL) engages and disengages with Stewart (DET) following the release of the jump shot attempt.
Stewart (DET) makes contact with the ball as simultaneous incidental contact occurs with Finney-Smith's (DAL) arm/side as Finney-Smith retrieves the rebound.
Hayes (DET) is shuffling alongside Doncic's (DAL) path and absorbs the marginal body contact as they come together during Doncic's drive.
Hayes (DET) raises his left arm up and initiates contact with Doncic's (DAL) right arm during his upward shooting motion.

Bagley III (DET) engages and disengages with Finney-Smith (DAL) after the release of the free throw attempt. Bagley III and Finney-Smith each then make clean contact with the ball as they elevate prior to any incidental contact occurring.
Stewart (DET) grasps and then quickly releases Kleber's (DAL) jersey during rebounding.
Stewart (DET) leans forward slightly prior to the marginal side-to-side contact occurring with Hardaway Jr. (DAL) during the pick.

Bagley III (DET) and Burks (DET) each maintain legal guarding positions as they double team Doncic. After Doncic releases the pass, Bagley III moves forward slightly and marginal contact occurs with Doncic's front.
Stewart (DET) brushes Bullock's (DAL) right shoulder and marginal contact occurs as Bullock elevates for the layup attempt.
Hardaway Jr. (DAL) commits a take foul on Bogdanovic (DET).
Hayes (DET) establishes himself in Finney-Smith's (DAL) path and does not deliver illegal contact.
Bullock (DAL) maintains verticality and marginal body contact occurs with Bey (DET) as they come together in the corner.
Kleber (DAL) initiates contact across Bey's (DET) arms, affecting Bey's SQBR as he makes the pass.
Kleber (DAL) legally contests Stewart's (DET) jump shot attempt.

Bullock (DAL) raises his arm up as he pursues the rebound and marginal contact occurs with Hayes' (DET) head/shoulder as Hayes jumps toward the ball. Contact to an opponent's head/face can be deemed marginal when the result of a natural basketball move, provided the contact is not disproportionate or uncontrolled.

Finney-Smith (DAL) brings his right arm backward as he pursues the loose ball and marginal contact occurs with Hayes' (DET) head/neck area. Contact to an opponent's head/face can be deemed marginal when the result of a natural basketball move, provided the contact is not disproportionate or uncontrolled.
Bey (DET) and Finney-Smith (DAL) make incidental body/arm contact with one another as they pursue the loose ball.
Ivey (DET) engages and disengages with Finney-Smith (DAL) as Finney-Smith moves to set the pick.
Stewart (DET) brings his hand forward and marginal contact occurs with Doncic's (DAL) front as Doncic makes the pass.
Hayes (DET) initiates contact with Hardaway Jr.'s (DAL) arm and front during the drive.
Ivey (DET) engages and disengages with Finney-Smith (DAL) as Finney-Smith moves to set the pick.
Hayes (DET) avoids making contact with Wood (DAL) and legally contests the dunk attempt.
Bogdanovic (DET) establishes himself in Wood's (DAL) path and does not deliver illegal contact as the defensive switch simultaneously occurs.
Finney-Smith (DAL) intentionally kicks the ball.
Bogdanovic (DET) slightly extends to the side and marginal contact occurs with Wood (DAL) as Wood moves around the screen.
Bagley III (DET) establishes himself in Hardaway Jr.'s (DAL) path and does not deliver illegal contact.
Bogdanovic (DET) establishes himself in Wood's (DAL) path and does not deliver illegal contact as the defensive switch simultaneously occurs.
Wood (DAL) brings his hands toward Ivey's (DET) side and marginal contact occurs as Wood releases away to roll.
Finney-Smith (DAL) engages and disengages with Bogdanovic (DET) as Bogdanovic moves to set the pick.
Bogdanovic (DET) establishes himself in Wood's (DAL) path and does not deliver illegal contact simultaneously occurs.
Hayes (DET) and Hardaway Jr. (DAL) engage and disengage with one another during the inbound.
Ivey (DET) cleanly deflects the ball after Finney-Smith (DAL) releases the inbound across the sideline.
Ivey (DET) establishes the ball in the front court within eight seconds.
Ivey (DET) avoids making contact with Kleber (DAL) as he returns to the floor following his jump shot attempt.
Doncic (DAL) and Stewart (DET) each raise an arm up as they pursue the rebound and each make clean contact with the ball prior to any incidental contact occurring.
Hayes (DET) and Bogdanovic (DET) legally contest Kleber's (DAL) layup attempt.
